articles.author: Kate Yandell
articles.title: Q&A on the Second International Mpox Emergency - FactCheck.org
articles.description: Case numbers for the global mpox outbreak have decreased since 2022, but the situation in Africa has noticeably worsened. On Aug. 14, the World Health Organization once again declared an mpox public health emergency of international concern. Here, we answer q…
articles.content:
Este artículo estará disponible en español en El Tiempo Latino.
In 2022, mpox a disease caused by the monkeypox virus, which is found in small mammals and has been known to infect people in parts of… [+16421 chars]
